snippet: TROOSKIN--Beatrice, of Tinton Falls, NJ beloved wife of the late Jeremiah. Devoted mother of Alice (Michael) Donoghue, Orin (Christine) Trooskin and the late Richard. Loving grandmother and great-grandmother. Services will be held at Bloomfield-Cooper Jewish Chapels, 2130 Route 35, Ocean, NJ on Thursday, 1pm. 1/3
